###Lab Policies - [Powerpoint](Lab_Policies.html) {#policies}
1. Attendance in the laboratory is **mandatory**.  
+ [Contact Hans Lemke](mailto:bsci161@umd.edu), (HJP 3212) if you miss a lab for university excused reasons.   + You will not get credit for the prelab if you miss a lab for unexcused reasons.
+ Absence from **more than three** labs will result in automatic failure of the course.
+ You will not be permitted to attend laboratory if you arrive more than 10 minutes late - see Hans.  
+ Get a make up assignment for any absence to get your pre-lab and worksheet points! Just ask Hans
2. Work is due at the beginning of lab, unless otherwise indicated.  
+ The penalty for later work is **10% per day**, and _no work will be accepted more than five days late!!! _ 
+ Plagiarism is defined by the university as "intentionally or knowingly representing the words or ideas of another as one's own in any academic exercise." DON"T DO IT!  Cases of plagiarism **will** be referred to the Office of Judicial Programs for disciplinary action.  
+ If you have any doubt about what constitute plagiarism â€¦ ASK ME!!!!  
3. See the lab manual or [ELMS](https://myelms.umd.edu/courses/1227400/pages/policies-and-grading-information) for more details.
4. Syllabus available [here](https://myelms.umd.edu/courses/1227400/files/47113538/download?wrap=1).
